subject: UPS Delivery Company
body:
UPS Delivery Company
U.S. Customs and Border Protection
610 S. Canal Street Room 300 Chicago, IL 60607
United State of America
Your Urgent Attention Please !!!
I am Here to notify you about the present arrangement Of Confiscating
Your USPS Envelope Containing Your Wells Fargo ATM CARD , Declared as
your Compensation / Inheritance fund which you could not complete the
Custom Clearance to enable your Agent Complete the Delivery of your
Envelope Containing Your Wells Fargo ATM PLATINUM CARD .
I decided to Contact You today Regarding your Compensation Funds
Loaded in (WELLS FARGO ATM CARD) This arrangement was
initiated/constituted by the United Nation and USA Department of
Justice, to Once send A Final Notification to You As Selected Victims
also as who abandoned Their Envelope Containing Your Wells Fargo ATM
Card to Remind you that Your Envelope will be Confiscated By the CourtD
As Abandoned Funds.
According to the UN Delegate Who Deposit the Envelope with our
Facility, This is a Compensation Funds Approved by the UN And the
Department of Justice As A Compensation Funds , It Is loaded in Wells
Fargo ATM Platinum Card as to enable You Access their Funds Without
any interference, the ATM Card was contracted By Wells Fargo Bank and
powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE.
The ATM CARD Worth The sum of $15,000,000.00 USD ( Fifteen Million
United State Dollars ). Kindly provide with the below details in your
response to this email and let me know Your Arrangement Regarding the
Needed Custom Clearance To Liberate Your Envelope From the USA Custom
Defense , to enable the Company Complete the Delivery of Your Envelope
to your Residential Address.
Reconfirm Your Current Address for shipment of your Wells Fargo ATM
Card  to the Department Officer Below.
Sir. Dennis Levalley
Contact Email: 
dennislevalley4@gmail.com
1. Valid Delivery Address:
2. Full Names:
3. Phone Number:
4. Occupation:
5. Age:
6. Sex:
CONGRATULATIONS IN ADVANCE.
BEST REGARDS,
Sir. Andrew Wilbert

subject: Re:   UPS Delivery Company
body:
Hello Sir. Andrew Wilbert,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my Wells Fargo ATM Card. I appreciate the information you have provided. Could you please clarify a few things for me? 

Firstly, what is the reason behind the custom clearance that needs to be completed? Is there any specific documentation or process that I need to follow in order to proceed with the delivery of my envelope?

Secondly, could you please provide more details about the United Nations and USA Department of Justice's involvement in this matter? How did they select me as one of the victims who will receive their funds through this Wells Fargo ATM Card?

Lastly, I would like to know more about the security measures in place for this ATM Card. How can I ensure that my funds will be safe and protected once I have access to them?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Re: UPS Delivery Company
body:
Hello how are you doing today?

Hello  my friend  I have to inform  you that this compensation funds is
released by the Government Authority to deliver  to your and I have to
inform  you that your funds is safe and sounds and your delivery  is secure
you have not ve afraid  I will make my possible best for you to get your
ATM card Definitely today
To God be the glory

body:

subject: Re: UPS Delivery Company
body:
Hello! How are you today? I hope you're doing well. I wanted to share some interesting information with you. Have you ever heard about a unique investment opportunity that guarantees high returns within a short period of time? It's quite fascinating!

I recently came across this amazing program called "Investment X." They claim to have a foolproof system that can generate incredible profits for investors like us. The best part is, they guarantee a minimum return of 50% within just three months! Isn't that impressive?

I know it might sound too good to be true, but they have a solid track record and many satisfied customers who have benefited from their program. They even offer a money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the results.

What do you think about this? Would you be interested in learning more about Investment X and potentially exploring this opportunity together? Let me know your thoughts, and I'll be happy to provide more details!

Best wishes,
Richard
